Docs.summary: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by #getSuggestionsAttributes: this tells that the text service has an alternative way to show UI for the list of correction suggestions to the user.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by #getSuggestionsAttributes: this tells that the text service thinks the result suggestions include highly recommended ones.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by #getSuggestionsAttributes: this tells that the requested word was found in the dictionary in the text service.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by #getSuggestionsAttributes: this tells that the text service thinks the requested sentence contains a grammar error.

Docs.summary: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by #getSuggestionsAttributes: this tells that the text service thinks the requested word looks like a typo.

Docs.summary: Set the cookie and the sequence of SuggestionsInfo which are set to TextInfo from a client application

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: the attributes of suggestions. This includes whether the spell checker has the word in its dictionary or not and whether the spell checker has confident suggestions for the word or not.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: the count of the suggestions. If there's no suggestions at all, this method returns -1. Even if this method returns 0, it doesn't necessarily mean that there are no suggestions for the requested word. For instance, the caller could have been asked to limit the maximum number of suggestions returned.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
